title: Designing Online Learning Orientation: Project-Based Course for Science Field Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: No online learning experience, possession of beginner-level knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning in Science Fields Conducted by Practitioners in Smartphone Environments. Mobile-Optimized Content and Assessments Required Due to Lack of PC Access

learning_goals: Within two weeks, learners can utilize basic LMS (Learning Management System) functions (assignment submission, discussion board use, resource downloads) with 90% accuracy
Learners can achieve an 85% or higher deadline compliance rate by applying time management strategies over 4 weeks, at least 3 times.
Learners can collaborate with peers to complete a scientific data analysis project and attain a grade of 3.5/4.0 or higher based on the PBL assessment rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
